assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: In this study, only publicly available, anonymized data released under the Fort Lauderdale Agreement was analyzed, and thus, separate ethical approval was not required.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.
